description: Developed innovative, product-based applications integrating AI to enhance learning experiences. Key projects include Sayo, an interactive English learning platform; Penso, an AI-powered essay platform for students with teacher-assigned tasks and detailed AI-generated reports; and Makwan, a similar platform tailored for Chinese essays. Delivered scalable, user-friendly solutions while collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless AI integration.

Designed and developed applications based on client requirements, delivering solutions for both mobile and web platforms using Flutter. Ensured responsive and user-friendly interfaces across devices, maintaining consistency and high performance. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to meet client expectations, focusing on scalability, quality, and timely delivery.

Developed mobile applications tailored to client requirements, ensuring seamless user experiences and robust functionality. Designed and implemented APIs, handled front-end mobile development, and seamlessly integrated backend services into the apps. Collaborated closely with teams to deliver high-quality, efficient, and scalable solutions, meeting project deadlines and exceeding client expectations.
